	and ('{DestinationIP:label}' == '*' or (id_resp_h == tostring('{DestinationIP:label}')))
    and (resp_domain endswith_cs ".box.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".box.net" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".boxcdn.net" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".boxcloud.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".boxrelay.com") 
    or (resp_domain endswith_cs ".db.tt" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".dropbox-dns.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".dropbox.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".dropboxapi.com") 
    or (resp_domain == "accounts.google.com" or resp_domain == "apis.google.com" or (resp_domain startswith_cs "clients" and resp_domain endswith_cs ".google.com") or resp_domain == "docs.google.com" or resp_domain == "drive.google.com" or resp_domain == "gg.google.com" or resp_domain == "googledrive.com" or resp_domain == "gv1.com" or (resp_domain startswith_cs "lh" and resp_domain endswith_cs ".google.com")) 
    or (resp_domain == "s.ytimg.com" or resp_domain == "script.google.com" or resp_domain == "sheets.google.com" or resp_domain == "slides.google.com" or resp_domain == "takeout.google.com" or resp_domain == "talk.google.com" or resp_domain == "video.google.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".client-channel.google.com" or (resp_domain contains_cs ".clients" and resp_domain endswith_cs ".google.com") or resp_domain endswith_cs ".docs.google.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".drive.google.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".googleapis.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".googleusercontent.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".gstatic.com") 
    or (resp_domain endswith_cs ".sharepoint.com" or resp_domain == "onedrive.live.com")
| summarize rbytes = sum(todouble(resp_ip_bytes))
| extend MB=rbytes / 1024 / 1024
| extend MBytes=round(MB, 2)
| project MBytes

        or(resp_domain endswith_cs ".db.tt" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".dropbox-dns.com"   or resp_domain endswith_cs ".dropbox.com"  or resp_domain endswith_cs ".dropboxapi.com") 
        or (resp_domain == "accounts.google.com" or resp_domain == "apis.google.com" or "clients*.google.com" has resp_domain or resp_domain == "docs.google.com" or resp_domain == "drive.google.com" or resp_domain == "gg.google.com" or resp_domain == "googledrive.com" or resp_domain == "gv1.com" or (resp_domain startswith_cs "lh" and resp_domain endswith_cs ".google.com")) 
        or (resp_domain == "s.ytimg.com" or resp_domain == "script.google.com" or resp_domain =="sheets.google.com" or resp_domain == "slides.google.com" or resp_domain == "takeout.google.com" or resp_domain == "talk.google.com" or resp_domain == "video.google.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".client-channel.google.com" or (resp_domain contains_cs ".clients"and resp_domain endswith_cs ".google.com" ) or resp_domain endswith_cs ".docs.google.com"  or resp_domain endswith_cs ".drive.google.com" or resp_domain endswith_cs ".googleapis.com"  or resp_domain endswith_cs ".googleusercontent.com"   or resp_domain endswith_cs ".gstatic.com")

content.query:
VectraStream_function 
|where metadata_type == "metadata_ssl"
    and ('{SourceHostname:label}' == '*' or (orig_hostname == tostring('{SourceHostname:label}')))
	and ('{SourceIP:label}' == '*' or (id_orig_h == tostring('{SourceIP:label}')))
	and ('{DestinationIP:label}' == '*' or (id_resp_h == tostring('{DestinationIP:label}')))
    and isnotempty(server_name) and isnotempty(orig_hostname)
        and (version =="TLS1.0" or version =="TLS1.1" or version startswith_cs "SSL")
        or (cipher contains_cs "3DES" or cipher contains_cs "MD5" or cipher contains_cs "RC4" or cipher contains_cs "anon" or cipher contains_cs "CAMELLIA")
        and local_orig =="true" 
        and local_resp=="false"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by server_name, id_orig_h
| project TimeGenerated,uid, id_orig_h, orig_hostname, id_resp_h, id_resp_p,version, server_name,cipher
|order by TimeGenerated desc

        and ('{HostName:label}' == '*' or (orig_hostname == tostring('{HostName:label}')))
                and conn_state == "SF"

|order by duration desc

| extend  Minutes=round(min_calc,0)
| limit 20
| extend resp_domain= iff(isempty(resp_domain), "Not Available", resp_domain)
|project uid, id_orig_h, orig_hostname, id_resp_h, resp_hostname,resp_domain, service, id_resp_p, Minutes

content.query:
VectraStream_function
|where metadata_type =="metadata_x509"
    and ('{SourceHostname:label}' == '*' or (orig_hostname == tostring('{SourceHostname:label}')))
    and ('{SourceIP:label}' == '*' or (id_orig_h == tostring('{SourceIP:label}')))
	and ('{DestinationIP:label}' == '*' or (id_resp_h == tostring('{DestinationIP:label}')))
	and ('{Destinationport:label}' == '*' or (id_resp_p == ('{Destinationport:label}')))
	and ('{SearchKeyWord:label}' == '*' or (* has '{SearchKeyWord:label}'))
    and not (id_resp_p == 443 or id_resp_p == 993 or id_resp_p == 995 or id_resp_p == 465 or id_resp_p == 9001)
|project-rename ["Certificate Serial"]=certificate_serial
|summarize ["Certificate Issuer"] = make_set(certificate_issuer), ["Responder Port"] = make_set(id_resp_p), ["Certificate CN"] = make_set(certificate_cn), ["Responder Host"] = make_set(id_resp_h),count(certificate_cn)  by ["Certificate Serial"]

content.query:

    and ('{SourceHostname:label}' == '*' or (orig_hostname == tostring('{SourceHostname:label}')))

content.query:
VectraStream_function 
|where metadata_type == "metadata_isession"
    and ('{SourceHostname:label}' == '*' or (orig_hostname == tostring('{SourceHostname:label}')))
    and ('{SourceIP:label}' == '*' or (id_orig_h == tostring('{SourceIP:label}')))
	and ('{DestinationIP:label}' == '*' or (id_resp_h == tostring('{DestinationIP:label}')))
	and ('{DestinationPort:label}' == '*' or (id_resp_p == ('{DestinationPort:label}')))
	and ('{SearchKeyWord:label}' == '*' or (* has '{SearchKeyWord:label}'))
	and ('*' in ({Services}) or service in ({Services})) and isnotempty(orig_hostname)
|extend orig_megabytes=((todouble(orig_ip_bytes)/1024)/1024) 
|extend resp_megabytes=((todouble(resp_ip_bytes)/1024)/1024) 
|extend MB_in=round(resp_megabytes,2) 
|extend MB_out=round(orig_megabytes,2) 
|extend Total=MB_in+MB_out
|extend orig_hostname = iff(isempty(orig_hostname), "Not Available", orig_hostname)
|summarize ["Inbound Volume"]=sum(MB_in), ["Outbound Volume"]=sum(MB_out), ["Total Volume"]=sum(Total) by orig_hostname,service
|top 50 by ["Total Volume"] desc
